attributes.action: custodial sentences for those who cause death whilst driving without insurance
attributes.additional_details:
If you cause someone to loose their life whilst your driving a vehicle without a valid licence, valid insurance etc then you should receive w custodial prison sentence in line with manslaughter. 
Road death victims are treated like second class by society 
And the justice system is appalling
attributes.background: if you choose to drive a vehicle without checking you have valid insurance and cause someone else’s death then this should be viewed equal to manslaughter
